Abyssal protector is a pet that can be obtained from the Rewards Guardian. It is a much smaller version of the Abyssal guardians found within the Guardians of the Rift minigame.

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the chatbox will state You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a cat), it will be placed into their inventory. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack. If a player's inventory is full and they have a follower already, they will not receive the pet.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 coins to Probita in East Ardougne to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 coins.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The fronts of the Abyssal guardians and the Abyssal protector have a yellow square and pink star-shaped pattern, a reference to SpongeBob and Patrick from the television show SpongeBob SquarePants.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod West's Twitter account. 23 Mar 2022. (Archived from the original on 23 Mar 2022.) Mod West: "Yes", in reply to Mod Nin: "is that spongebob and patrick".

[[File:Abyssal protector chathead.png|left]]
'''Abyssal protector''' is a [[pet]] that can be obtained from the [[Rewards Guardian]]. It is a much smaller version of the [[Abyssal guardian (Guardians of the Rift)|Abyssal guardian]]s found within the [[Guardians of the Rift]] [[minigame]].

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the [[Chat Interface|chatbox]] will state {{Colour|#ef1020|You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.}}

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a [[cat]]), it will be placed into their [[inventory]]. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state {{Colour|#ef1020|You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack.}} If a player's inventory is full '''and''' they have a follower already, they '''will not''' receive the pet.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 [[coins]] to [[Probita]] in [[East Ardougne]] to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 [[coins]].
